CustomField.description: Rev Rec Amount is typically calculated as Rev Rec Quantity * Unit Price Rev Rec Amount is rounded up to 2 decimals and adjustments to match the Sales Order Total are applied on the last period
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rev Rec Amount is typically calculated as Rev Rec Quantity * Unit Price Rev Rec Amount is rounded up to 2 decimals and adjustments to match the Sales Order Total are applied on the last period
CustomField.label: Rev Rec Amount
